title: "Forest Falls Wallpaper"
content: This website is dedicated to providing high-quality wallpapers featuring stunning natural landscapes. Our current main wallpaper showcases a breathtaking waterfall nestled within a lush forest. Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature every time you open your device with our carefully curated selection of wallpapers. Whether you're looking for a serene background for work or a peaceful image to relax to, we've got you covered. Download our Forest Falls Wallpaper today and bring a piece of the great outdoors into your daily life.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A waterfall in the forest"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
